languages.text: "Прояви должное уважение, сын. Прошу его простить, Ваша Светлость. Юноша впервые удостоился внимания Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Прояви должное уважение, сын. Прошу его простить, Ваша Светлость. Юноша впервые удостоился внимания Вольного Торговца".
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Son, show due respect. Forgive him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is the first time he has had the honour of attracting the attention of the Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Прояви должное уважение, сын. Прошу его простить, Ваша Светлость. Юноша впервые удостоился внимания Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Son, show due respect. Forgive him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is the first time that he has the honour of attracting the attention of a Rogue Trader."

languages.text: 「息子よ、敬意を見せなさい。お許しください、陛下。息子にとって、自由開拓者に気を向けていただくという栄誉を授かるのは初めてのことなのです」
languages.original_text: "Son, show due respect. Forgive him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is the first time he has had the honour of attracting the attention of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「息子よ、敬意を見せなさい。お許しください、陛下。息子にとって、自由開拓者に気を向けていただくという栄誉を授かるのは初めてのことなのです」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “好孩子，拿出应有的礼貌来。大人，请您原谅，这还是他第一次在行商浪人这样的贵人面前亮相呢。”
languages.original_text: "Son, show due respect. Forgive him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is the first time he has had the honour of attracting the attention of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “好孩子，拿出应有的礼貌来。大人，请您原谅，这还是他第一次在行商浪人这样的贵人面前亮相呢。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Fais preuve d'un peu plus de respect, mon fils. Pardonnez-lui, Votre Seigneurie. C'est la première fois qu'il a l'honneur d'être au centre de l'attention d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Son, show due respect. Forgive him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is the first time he has had the honour of attracting the attention of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Fais preuve d'un peu plus de respect, mon fils. Pardonnez-lui, Votre Seigneurie. C'est la première fois qu'il a l'honneur d'être au centre de l'attention d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Hijo, muestra el debido respeto. Perdónele, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Es la primera vez que tiene el honor de estar ante {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Son, show due respect. Forgive him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is the first time he has had the honour of attracting the attention of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Hijo, muestra el debido respeto. Perdónele, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Es la primera vez que tiene el honor de estar ante {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Sohn, zeigt den gebührenden Respekt. Vergebt ihm, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Er hat zum ersten Mal die Ehre, die Aufmerksamkeit eines Freihändlers zu genießen."
languages.original_text: "Son, show due respect. Forgive him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is the first time he has had the honour of attracting the attention of the Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Sohn, zeigt den gebührenden Respekt. Vergebt ihm, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Er hat zum ersten Mal die Ehre, die Aufmerksamkeit eines Freihändlers zu genießen."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Oğlum, saygıda kusur etmeyesin. Bağışlayınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Zatıaliniz Hür Tacir'in huzuruna ilk kez çıkıyor da."
languages.original_text: "Son, show due respect. Forgive him, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. This is the first time he has had the honour of attracting the attention of the Rogue Trader."
